name: Nick Solana
text: Roy, allegations are allegations. Pano kung maraming atraso yung mga yan kahit 14 nga ang age, sure ka agad na extrajudicial ang killing?  it is not likely na yung may atraso sila ang naningil? The only real objective objection here is: are there significant numbers of unsolved murders in Davao City? and what is has the PNP done about it? How come yung hindi supporters ambilis maghusga ng extrajudicial killings masterminded by somebody and that an entrire generation of Davaoenos choose to ignore injustice? Balik pa rin ako sa selective injustice ata ang spin na ito:  throw the "innocent before proven guilty" HUMAN RIGHT so we can defame a man, no, an entire generation. tsk.
